context: The word 'sööme' is the 1st person plural present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'sööma' (to eat). It means 'we eat' or 'are eating'. In Estonian, verbs are conjugated by person and number. The ending '-me' indicates that this is the first person plural (we) form in the present tense. This would be used when describing what a group of people (including the speaker) currently eats regularly.
